1907 Wolverine News postcard Donovan-Correspondence upper right side of the front of the postcard-$200.00 The shipping and handling on this postcard is $6.00

1907-1909 H M Taylor postcard of Donovan, Jennings and Chance-a couple creases which are shown in separate pictures. Also, corner wear.-$500.00-The shipping and handling on this postcard is $6.00

Payment is preferred by PayPal Gift/Friends and Family with the s/h being an additional $6.00 to [url]wizard15243@yahoo.com[/url].
